definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be divided, separate (Ar. badala change, substitute, Mish. [[בָּדַל]] divide, Syr. bdal Ithp. Ethp.)—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: divide, separate; Pf. [[הִבְדִּיל]] Nu 16:9, De 10:8; sf. [[וְהִבְדִּילוֹ]] consec. De 29:20; 3 fs. [[וְהִבְדִּילָה]] Ex 26:33; [[וְהִבְדַּלְתָּ]] Nu 8:14; [[הִבְדִּילוּ]] Ez Eze 22:26, etc. Impf. [[יַבְדִּיל]] Le 1:17 +; [[וַיַּבְדֵּל]] Ge 1:4, Ge 1:7, 1Ch 25:1; sf. [[יַבְדִּילַנִי]] Is 56:3; [[וׇאַבְדִּל]] Le 20:26; [[וׇאַבְדִּילָה]] Ezr 8:24, etc.; Inf. abs. [[הַבְדֵּל]] Is 56:3; cstr. [[לְהַבְדִּיל]] Ge 1:14 +; Pt. [[מַבְדִּיל]] Ge 1:6; [[מַבְדִּילִים]] Is 59:2; —

divide, separate, subj. God Ge 1:4 sq. [[וּבֵין]]…. [[בֵּין]] between light and darkness, cf. v:Ge 1:7; subj. heavenly bodies v:Ge 1:14, v:Ge 1:18; subj. firmament sq. [[לְ]]…[[בֵּין]] Ge 1:6 (all in P's source); Ex 26:33 of the [[פָּרׂכֶת]] in tab., sq. …[[וּבֵין]]…[[בֵּין]] [[לָכֶם]]; of iniquities, separating men from God [[לְבֵין]]…[[בֵּין]] Is 59:2.

separate, set apart, sq. [[מִן]], of ´[[י]], setting off Isr. from other peoples Le 20:24 (H) Nu 16:9 (P); Le 20:26 sq. also [[לִהְיוֹת לִי]]; cf. 1Ki 8:53 [[לְךָ לְנַחֲלָה]] ´[[הִבְדּ]] separate them to thyself as an inheritance; of Moses, setting apart Levites, sq. [[מִתּוֹח]] Nu 8:14; of separating an individual from the people, i.e. excluding him De 29:20, sq. also [[לְרָעָה]]; sq. [[מֵעַל]] Is 56:3, Is 56:3, i.e. excluding him; cf. also Ne 13:3 sq. [[מִן]]; of setting apart (forbidding) beasts as unclean [[לָכֶם לְטַמֵּא]] Le 20:25; of setting apart the tribe of Levi ´[[לָשֵׂאת וגו]] De 10:8 (subj. ´[[י]]); cf. also (hum. subj.) 1Ch 25:1, sq. [[לַעֲבׂדָה]], 2Ch 25:10 sq. Inf.; similarly Ezr 8:24; even sq. ptcp. Ez Eze 39:14 they shall set apart men [[עׂבְרִים]], i.e. to pass through, or, men that shall pass through (RV); so of setting apart cities, acc. De 4:41 cf. De 19:2, De 19:7.
make a distinction between clean and unclean, holy and profane, sq. [[וּבֵין]]…[[בֵּין]] Le 20:25 (H); Le 10:10, Le 11:47 (both P); sq. [[לְ]]…[[בֵּין]] Ez Eze 22:26; Eze 42:20.
divide into parts Le 1:17; Le 5:8 (P), prohibited in case of fowls offered in sacrifice.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: separate oneself from people of the land, heathen, and their practices, also from non-Jewish wives, sq. [[מִן]] Ezr 6:21, Ezr 9:1, Ezr 10:11, Ne 9:2; abs. in same sense Ezr 10:16 (cf. Sta:G. ii. 199 & 179 n. Wl: Pharisäer u. Sadd. 76).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: withdraw from (Moses & Aaron from Israel) Nu 16:21 (P), sq. [[מִתּוֹח]].

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: be excluded from the people, sq. [[מִן]] Ezr 10:8. [[ב]]: be set apart, of Aaron, sq. [[לְהַקְדִּישׁוֹ]] 1Ch 23:13.—On [[הבדיל]], & distinction fr. [[הפריד]] v. Dr:JPh. xi. 219.
